verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When my hope and strength is gone
You're the one who calls me on
You are the life
You are the fight
That's in my soul

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, Your resurrection power
Burns like fire in my heart
When waters rise
I lift my eyes
Up to Your throne

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are more than conquerors, through Christ
You have overcome this world, this life
We will not bow to sin or to shame
We are defiant in Your name

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are the fire that cannot be tamed
You are the power in our veins
Our Lord, our God, our Conqueror

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I will sing into the night
Christ is risen and on high
Greater is He
Living in me
Than in the world

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
No surrender, no retreat
We are free and we're redeemed
We will declare
Over despair
You are the hope

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Nothing is impossible
Every chain is breakable
With You, we are victorious
You are stronger than our hearts
You are greater than the dark
With You, we are victorious
